data.title: Department Chair and Professor, Susan P Harrison, Highlights Ecosystem Diversity in UC Davis Research Sites
data.meta_description: In an article featured on the UC Davis website, Susan P Harrison discusses the importance of the UC Davis McLaughlin Natural Reserve research site.  The news feature describes a 15-year study Harrison worked on which described the decline plant diversity due to climate change.  This study is published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States.
data.text:
In an article featured on the UC Davis website, Susan P Harrison discusses the importance of the UC Davis McLaughlin Natural Reserve research site. The news feature describes a 15-year study Harrison worked on which described the decline plant diversity due to climate change. This study is published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States.

Read the full article:

https://www.ucdavis.edu/news/saving-space-research

Read the study:
